```{r setup,include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(cache=TRUE,echo=FALSE)
```

```{r rows}
shiny::fluidRow(
    shinydashboard::box(
        width=4,
        shiny::fluidRow(
            shinydashboard::box(
                width=3,
                'hi')
            ),
        shiny::fluidRow(
            shinydashboard::box(
                width=3,
                'yo'
                )
        )
    ),
    shinydashboard::box('bye', width=8)
    )
```
